title: Azir broken?
body:
I don't know if anyone else has been getting this issue but almost every time I got to auto attack a minion with a soldier Azir just starts running in a random direction and I have to keep right clicking every auto-attack to make sure  Azir doesn't start runnng off somewhere.

I know you miss Shurima  Azir but you're in a battle, stop trying to run away {{champion:268}} {{champion:268}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

We're aware of a lingering bug where Azir can start automatically moving after issuing soldier attack commands. However, because movement is canceled by other inputs and Azir is a high-input champion, we feel it didn't warrant leaving Azir disabled. It'll be fixed next patch!
Riot knows about this, and it is fixed internally. Should be out by the next patch.
